scripts.build:menuPrincipal: ng build menuPrincipal && cd dist/menu-principal && npm publish --access public
scripts.build:resourceSharing: ng build resourceSharing && cp projects/resource-sharing/src/lib/shared-styles/*.scss dist/resource-sharing && cd dist/resource-sharing &&  cd ../../ && cp -Rf projects/resource-sharing/src dist/resource-sharing/src && cd dist/resource-sharing && npm publish --access public
scripts.build:resourceSharingDev: ng build resourceSharing && cp projects/resource-sharing/src/lib/shared-styles/*.scss dist/resource-sharing  && cd dist/resource-sharing &&  cd ../../ &&  cp -Rf projects/resource-sharing/src dist/resource-sharing/src
